author: rbb
msg: Note the removal of coalesce filter in the CHANGES file, and also note
that we have moved on to the next minor version number.

author: rbb
msg: Remove the coalesce filter.  With the addition of the ap_f* functions,
this filter is no longer necessary.

author: wrowe
msg: Goodness for mod_dav, submitted by Brad Nichoes <bnicholes@novell.com>

author: rbb
msg: Fix the seg fault in mod_status.c.  This changes the up_time to an
interval_time.  The segfault is caused by apr_vformatter not understanding
%lld, so we also had to change that to %qd, which solves that problem.

author: wrowe
msg: Gotta remember someone reads these, sooner or later
